subject: Rodeos
Drug Abuse and Traffic
Bull Riding
Deaths (Fatalities)
lead_paragraph: Bryan Guthrie, a 21-year-old who had earned a top ranking in bull riding and was living the rodeo dream, lost his life to a different danger: heroin.
snippet: Bryan Guthrie, a 21-year-old who had earned a top ranking in bull riding and was living the rodeo dream, lost his life to a different danger: heroin.
